name: dokemon
description: Dokemon is a Kubernetes cluster monitoring and management dashboard. It visualizes workloads, namespaces, resources, and events in an accessible web interface, making cluster status and troubleshooting more approachable for platform teams.
features: Cluster visualization: View all Kubernetes resources including pods, services, and deployments in a unified dashboard.
Namespace management: Switch between namespaces and filter resources by scope for organized multi-tenant environments.
Resource monitoring: Track CPU, memory, and storage usage across nodes and workloads with real-time metrics.
Event tracking: Monitor cluster events and state changes to identify issues and understand system behavior.
Log aggregation: Access container logs directly from the interface without kubectl commands for faster troubleshooting.
Workload control: Start, stop, and scale deployments through the web UI with immediate feedback on status changes.
RBAC integration: Respect Kubernetes permissions to show only resources accessible to the authenticated user.
Multi-cluster support: Connect to multiple Kubernetes environments and switch between them from a single interface.
